excerpt: "Illinois residents urged a federal judge Friday not to let Macy's turn the state's landmark biometric privacy statute into \"a toothless tiger,\" saying the court should decline the company's bid to escape multidistrict litigation stemming from a facial recognition database developed by Clearview AI Inc."
